attributes.action: Ensure the future of Local Post Offices by ensuring that The Post Office Card Account remains a Post Office Product
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Gov. is to choose a successor to the Post Office for the benefits card account. Most people need to receive payments at a local post office, without the card account most post offices will have to shut down.
Keep the POCA2 with the Post Office!
Closing local post offices is destroying local communities & causing hardship to vulnerable people and OAP & disabled.
KEEP THE CARD ACCOUNT A POST OFFICE PRODUCT
